item.title: Trump Just Approved a TikTok Deal at a Shocking $14 Billion Valuation. Its New Owners Remain Unclear
item.description: There are plenty of questions swirling around the TikTok deal, from the valuation of the company to who exactly is buying it.

item.title: Why This Influencer Says Businesses Risk Missing Out on the ‘Third Nuclear Renaissance’
item.description: Isabelle Boemeke, the author and model, spoke at a symposium for nuclear power in New York City.

item.title: Yes, Food Perks at Work Do Motivate Employees, This Study Says
item.description: Research shows that some benefits really do help staff perform better. but your company has to choose the right ones.

item.title: Why Retail Hiring Is Expected to Drop to Its Lowest Level in Over a Decade
item.description: A new forecast from Challenger, Gray & Christmas expects retailers to hire fewer than 500,000 people for the year-end season, the lowest level since 2...

item.title: This Company Is Turning Empty Offices Across America Into Indoor Farms
item.description: Area 2 Farms is a three-year-old company based in Arlington, Virginia, that’s taking the concept of indoor farming to unusual spaces.
